outline:
1. irrigation, drink
    1. irrigation
    2. drink, drinking vessels
    3. butlership (office of butler)
  2. butler, cup-bearer
kjv_def: butler(-ship), cupbearer, drink(-ing), fat pasture, watered.
strongs_def: properly, causing to drink, i.e. a butler; by implication (intransitively), drink (itself); figuratively, a well-watered region
